text: Rene Ahrens is an Australian athlete and wheelchair basketball player with a disability. He won two bronze medals: one at the 1980 Arnhem Games in the Men's Discus 5 and the other at the 1988 Summer Paralympics in the Men's Discus 6. He also played wheelchair basketball for Australia at the 1980 games. == References == Category:Australian athletes Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Australia Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Wheelchair basketball players Category:1980 Summer Paralympics Category:1988 Summer Paralympics
title: Rene Ahrens
